mapper.insert: INSERT INTO experience_order( customer_id, experience_name, experience_order_people, experience_order_startdate, experience_order_enddate, create_Date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{customerId}, #{experienceName}, #{experienceOrderPeople}, #{experienceOrderStartDate}, #{experienceOrderEndDate}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO experience_payment( experience_order_id, experience_payment_method, experience_payment_method_number, experience_payment_money, create_date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{experienceOrderId}, #{experiencePaymentMethod}, #{experiencePaymentMethodNumber}, #{experiencePaymentMoney}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT experience_order_id FROM experience_order WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT experience_price experiencePrice FROM experience WHERE experience_id = #{experienceId}
SELECT experience_name experienceName FROM experience WHERE experience_id = #{experienceId}

SELECT experience_order_id experienceOrderId, customer_id customerId, experience_name experienceName, experience_order_people experienceOrderPeople, experience_order_startdate experienceOrderStartDate, experience_order_enddate experienceOrderEndDate, create_Date createDate, update_Date updateDate FROM experience_order where customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{ROW_PER_PAGE}
